name: cloudobjects/sdk
description: CloudObjects SDK for PHP for working with COIDs and object descriptions from CloudObjects.

suggest.symfony/http-foundation: Required to use parseSymfonyRequest() in AccountContext.
suggest.symfony/psr-http-message-bridge: Required to use parseSymfonyRequest() in AccountContext.
suggest.zendframework/zend-diactoros: Required to use parseSymfonyRequest() in AccountContext.
